turns.text: Uh what sort of camping do you like to do the most

turns.label: aa^r

turns.text: Uh that can be lot of fun too
turns.label: sv

turns.text: Yeah like to go visit uh the national parks and state parks and and uh just get out and see nature
Well so far my wife and I have pretty much had to stick with tent camping
turns.label: sd

turns.text: This summer we went to uh the Smokey Mountain National Park
turns.label: sd

turns.text: And uh stayed about three or four days in there It was wonderful
Nights were cool enough to where theyre comfortable
turns.label: sd

turns.text: And the days were nice and warm and it was beautiful beautiful few days

turns.text: It worked out particularly well especially considering she was what six months pregnant
turns.label: sd

turns.text: So I dont know it worked pretty well It was one of those uh those dome type pop up tents

uh-huh yeah I had been there before when I lived in California but thats my first trip back in oh goodness um um thirty years maybe

They seem to be trailing out quickly
